attr.title: Erebos
attr.desc: As you wake up from cryo, you quickly realize that something's amiss on board the Erebos.  It's up to you to figure it out and stay alive. Can you get all 6 endings?!
attr.inst: Grab the game from here. Make sure you grab the Linux version and then put the erebos_linux.pck in the gamedata folder. https://steamknight.itch.io/erebos
